content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** labubu bag charm tutorial 1 ** we re crafting something trendy and adorable its a bag charm featuring the popular labubu if you re a beginner searching for an easy pattern a fan of amigurumi or simply like me love labubu this tutorial is perfect for you what do you think of a mini labubu bag charm that doubles up as a car mirror accessory join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a labubu bag charm from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own mini labubu bag charm in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this labubu tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - any light pastel color or any labubu color and beige a small amount of black or dark brown and the darker version of the pastel color you are using * small amounts of felt in white also small amount of black felt if you are making labubu with open eyes * crochet hook * yarn needle * stitch markers * stuffing * strong glue or hot glue i use 4ply milk cotton yarn and a 3mm hook if you want your mini labubu bag charm to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet a mini labubu bag charm * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals * tips on how to realistic unique and outstanding ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * full crochet mini labubu bag charm free * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/iptgc-kmse0
